summary:
A cute skin for CBBE and UNP, for PC´s which can only handle 1K- 2K.
Become a idol girl.
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[img]https://m-master.000webhostapp.com/modimages/massivemasterbanner_baby.png[/img]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/DHCpmWV.png[/img][/center]
[center][color=#fff2cc][color=#ffe599][size=6][size=5][color=#fff2cc]★[/color][/size]Description[/size][/color][size=5][color=#fff2cc]★[/color][/size][size=3]

The skins are HD and Low spec Texture replacer pack for CBBE and UNP.
(2K Diffusemap, 2K Specularmap, 2K Normalmap)
It also exists a "Potato" texture set for the PCs which can only handle anything below 1K
1K body and facial option will be added.
And It exists a option for more mature looking girls , in early 30´s.
This includes a vampire skin version to avoid getting neck seams.

[color=#dd7e6b][size=4][b]Check out Optional files for more options [/b][/size][/color]
[color=#cc0000]
[color=#f1c232][b][size=4]Coming soon:[/size][/b][/color][/color]

1K set only coming soon...
New Normal maps
New  sweat Specular
New and Better Specular.


[b][size=5]Optional files for:[/size][/b]
[color=#ffffff][b]- Removal of Bronze lines.
- [/b][/color][color=#ffffff][b]Ethereal Elven Patch for normal map and neck seam.
- More mature looking normal map.[/b][/color]


========================================

The skin is Based on Photos of Idol Girls from Japan & Korea
I also want to thank SG  and CBBE, UNP TEXTURES textures for being used.
[color=#fff2cc][size=3]I will not make it SSE unless someone helps me.[/size][/color]
I edited original skins, and added features into one.
Normal maps are edited via Photoshop & Gimp.

[color=#fff2cc][size=3]========================================[/size][/color]

[size=6]Requirements[/size]

[/size][/color] [color=#fff2cc][size=3][size=3]★ CBBE

 [color=#fff2cc][size=3][size=3]★ UNP[/size][/size][/color]

[color=#fff2cc][size=3][color=#fff2cc][size=3]========================================
[color=#fff2cc][size=3][size=6]PERMISSION:[/size][/size][/color][/size][/color][/size][/color]
[/size][/size][/color][/center][center]You are allowed to use my skin to any follower for Skyrim or Skyrim SSE.
But Please credit me, would mean so much.

[color=#fff2cc][size=3][color=#fff2cc][size=3]========================================[/size][/color]

========================================[/size][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#fff2cc][size=3][size=6]BUGS:[/size][/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff]
Neckseam or discoloring means you have not installed the files correctly.
This is a texture mod, it can´t CTD , unless you have a pc that can´t handle 2k
[/color]
